author: arunhep
body:
# Summary of changes in Global Tags

## Upgrade

   * **PhaseI 2017 cosmics peak scenario** : [92X_upgrade2017cosmics_realistic_peak_v1](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/92X_upgrade2017cosmics_realistic_peak_v1) as [91X_upgrade2017cosmics_realistic_peak_v5](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/91X_upgrade2017cosmics_realistic_peak_v5) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/92X_upgrade2017cosmics_realistic_peak_v1/91X_upgrade2017cosmics_realistic_peak_v5):
      * updated simulation geometry with BPix fixes : https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/calibrations/2923.html
      * updated reco geometry with BPix Fixes : https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/calibrations/2923.html
      * Fixed SiPixel Fed Cabling map https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/calibrations/2924.html
      * update of tracker alignment and APEs for 92X MC production https://indico.cern.ch/event/637519/contributions/2603391/
      * Fix in HCAL SiPM which only affects high energy rechits : https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/calibrations/2960.html
      * update of ECAL spike killing for L1 trigger objects https://indico.cern.ch/event/637516/contributions/2593517/

   * **PhaseI 2017 cosmics scenario** : [92X_upgrade2017cosmics_realistic_deco_v1](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/92X_upgrade2017cosmics_realistic_deco_v1) as [91X_upgrade2017cosmics_realistic_deco_v5](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/91X_upgrade2017cosmics_realistic_deco_v5) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/92X_upgrade2017cosmics_realistic_deco_v1/91X_upgrade2017cosmics_realistic_deco_v5):
      * updated simulation geometry with BPix fixes : https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/calibrations/2923.html
      * updated reco geometry with BPix Fixes : https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/calibrations/2923.html
      * Fixed SiPixel Fed Cabling map https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/calibrations/2924.html
      * update of tracker alignment and APEs for 92X MC production https://indico.cern.ch/event/637519/contributions/2603391/
      * Fix in HCAL SiPM which only affects high energy rechits : https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/calibrations/2960.html
      * update of ECAL spike killing for L1 trigger objects https://indico.cern.ch/event/637516/contributions/2593517/

   * **PhaseI 2017 design scenario** : [92X_upgrade2017_design_IdealBS_v1](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/92X_upgrade2017_design_IdealBS_v1) as [91X_upgrade2017_design_IdealBS_v5](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/91X_upgrade2017_design_IdealBS_v5) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/92X_upgrade2017_design_IdealBS_v1/91X_upgrade2017_design_IdealBS_v5):
      * updated simulation geometry with BPix fixes : https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/calibrations/2923.html
      * updated reco geometry with BPix Fixes : https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/calibrations/2923.html
      * Fixed SiPixel Fed Cabling map https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/calibrations/2924.html
      * Fix in HCAL SiPM which only affects high energy rechits : https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/calibrations/2960.html
      * update of ECAL spike killing for L1 trigger objects https://indico.cern.ch/event/637516/contributions/2593517/

   * **PhaseI 2017 realistic scenario** : [92X_upgrade2017_realistic_v1](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/92X_upgrade2017_realistic_v1) as [91X_upgrade2017_realistic_v5](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/91X_upgrade2017_realistic_v5) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/92X_upgrade2017_realistic_v1/91X_upgrade2017_realistic_v5):
      * updated simulation geometry with BPix fixes : https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/calibrations/2923.html
      * updated reco geometry with BPix Fixes : https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/calibrations/2923.html
      * Fixed SiPixel Fed Cabling map https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/calibrations/2924.html
      * update of tracker alignment and APEs for 92X MC production https://indico.cern.ch/event/637519/contributions/2603391/
      * Fix in HCAL SiPM which only affects high energy rechits : https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/calibrations/2960.html
      * update of ECAL spike killing for L1 trigger objects https://indico.cern.ch/event/637516/contributions/2593517/

   * **PhaseI 2018 cosmics scenario** : [92X_upgrade2018cosmics_realistic_deco_v1](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/92X_upgrade2018cosmics_realistic_deco_v1) as [91X_upgrade2018cosmics_realistic_deco_v5](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/91X_upgrade2018cosmics_realistic_deco_v5) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/92X_upgrade2018cosmics_realistic_deco_v1/91X_upgrade2018cosmics_realistic_deco_v5):
      * updated simulation geometry with BPix fixes : https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/calibrations/2925.html
      * updated reco geometry with BPix Fixes : https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/calibrations/2925.html
      * Fixed SiPixel Fed Cabling map https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/calibrations/2924.html
      * update of tracker alignment and APEs for 92X MC production https://indico.cern.ch/event/637519/contributions/2603391/
      * Fix in HCAL SiPM which only affects high energy rechits : https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/calibrations/2960.html

   * **PhaseI 2018 design scenario** : [92X_upgrade2018_design_IdealBS_v1](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/92X_upgrade2018_design_IdealBS_v1) as [91X_upgrade2018_design_IdealBS_v5](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/91X_upgrade2018_design_IdealBS_v5) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/92X_upgrade2018_design_IdealBS_v1/91X_upgrade2018_design_IdealBS_v5):
      * updated simulation geometry with BPix fixes : https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/calibrations/2925.html
      * updated reco geometry with BPix Fixes : https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/calibrations/2925.html
      * Fixed SiPixel Fed Cabling map https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/calibrations/2924.html
      * Fix in HCAL SiPM which only affects high energy rechits : https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/calibrations/2960.html

   * **PhaseI 2018 realistic scenario** : [92X_upgrade2018_realistic_v1](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/92X_upgrade2018_realistic_v1) as [91X_upgrade2018_realistic_v5](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/91X_upgrade2018_realistic_v5) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/92X_upgrade2018_realistic_v1/91X_upgrade2018_realistic_v5):
      * updated simulation geometry with BPix fixes : https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/calibrations/2925.html
      * updated reco geometry with BPix Fixes : https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/calibrations/2925.html
      * Fixed SiPixel Fed Cabling map https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/calibrations/2924.html
      * update of tracker alignment and APEs for 92X MC production https://indico.cern.ch/event/637519/contributions/2603391/
      * Fix in HCAL SiPM which only affects high energy rechits : https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/calibrations/2960.html
title: MC GTs updated with BPix fixes Fed Cabling, Sim geometry, HCALSiPM Fix
